__Replication Information__  
This site is created in the _R_ statistical program using Markdown with the _blogdown_ package and a [Hugo](https://gohugo.io/){target="_blank"} theme. Analyses are conducted in _R_, and visualizations are created using the _plotly_ package.<br><br>
_R_ Markdown files with replication scripts and data sources for all analyses can be found on my [GitHub](https://github.com/yioryos-nardis/yioryos-nardis.github.io){target="_blank"} page in the "post" folder.
